snippet: The longtime Connecticut basketball coach, Jim Calhoun, is beset by health concerns and will retire Thursday, according to multiple media reports.
abstract: Jim Calhoun, a renowned coach whose verve and talent turned a mainly regional program into a national college basketball powerhouse, reportedly will retire as Connecticut’s coach.
lead_paragraph: The longtime Connecticut basketball coach, Jim Calhoun, is beset by health concerns and will retire Thursday, according to multiple media reports.

headline.seo: Jim Calhoun Said to Be Calling It Quits as UConn Coach
headline.main: Reports Say Calhoun Is Retiring as Coach
headline.print_headline: Reports Say Calhoun Is Retiring as Coach
